questions.correctAnswer: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder.
incorrectAnswers: The drug-induced utopias of four addicts are shattered when their addictions run deep.
A paleontologist is tasked with protecting two children when cloned dinosaurs are set free.
A destitute family builds a symbiotic relationship with a wealthy family.
